cause.description:
The internet is at the crossroads:
"The nation's largest telephone and cable companies — including AT&T, Verizon, Comcast and Time Warner — want to be Internet gatekeepers, deciding which Web sites go fast or slow and which won't load at all." (www.savetheinternet.com)
In other words, huge corporations have a profit motive to control the flow of the internet, and are trying to pass legislation that would allow them to do just that.
What can we do about it?
Be heard! Go to: http://www.savetheinternet.com/=act
Contact your local congressmen and let them know that net neutrality is a vital issue for you and this nation!
Learn more about the issue: -http://www.alternet.org/mediaculture/35557/ -http://www.savetheinternet.com/
1. Net neutrality legislation is necessary for the preservation of a free internet
2. The network's only job is to move data — not choose which data to privilege with higher quality service
cause.mission: save the internet as we know it
cause.name: Save The Internet
